channel.title: Summoning issue

item.title: Summoning issue
item.dc:creator: @Simba96 Simba96
item.description:
@Simba96 wrote:

ok so on my server summoning works , pouches summon the npc but the problem is if i have a summon npc summoned and i try to summon another it wont summon and will say “you already have a summoned npc” but it will still delete the pouch i attempted to spawn

heres 2 examples

case 12069:
summon(c, 6850);
c.getItems().deleteItem(12069, c.getItems().getItemSlot(12069), 1);
break;

case 12071:
summon(c, 6852);
c.getItems().deleteItem(12071, c.getItems().getItemSlot(12071), 1);
break;

i added the
c.getItems().deleteItem(, c.getItems().getItemSlot(), 1); line because before they wernt deleteing after a summmon

Read full topic
